law.catch_line: An individual aggrieved by a final decision of the Board in a contested case, as defined in § 10-20...
law.text: An individual aggrieved by a final decision of the Board in a contested case, as defined in § 10-202 of the State Government Article, may take an appeal as allowed in §§ 10-222 and 10-223 of the State Government Article.
